name: System Information Collection
description: Collect comprehensive system information including hardware specs, disk space, running processes, and generate a detailed system report

steps.guidance: I'll help you collect comprehensive system information. First, let me gather basic system details using PowerShell.
steps.command: Get-ComputerInfo | Select-Object WindowsProductName, WindowsVersion, TotalPhysicalMemory, CsProcessors | ConvertTo-Json

steps.guidance: Now I'll check disk space and storage information.
steps.command: Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_LogicalDisk | Select-Object DeviceID, Size, FreeSpace, VolumeName | ConvertTo-Json

steps.guidance: Let me gather information about running processes and system performance.
steps.command: Get-Process | Select-Object Name, CPU, WorkingSet | Sort-Object CPU -Descending | Select-Object -First 10 | ConvertTo-Json

steps.guidance: Finally, I'll compile all the information into a comprehensive system report.
